data_table.description: MRI Screening Form, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: MSCA1
variable.description: [Exclusion]. Have you ever had an MRI scan? Q1 [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA2
variable.description: [Exclusion]. Have you ever had surgery on an aneurysm in your brain? Q2 [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA3
variable.description: [Exclusion]. Do you have metal fragments in your eyes, brain, or spinal cord? Q3 [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA4
variable.description: [Exclusion]. Do you have a cardiac pacemaker or a heart valve prosthesis? Q4 [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA5
variable.description: [Exclusion]. Do you have any internal electrical devices, such as a cochlear implant or spinal cord stimulator? Q5 [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA6
variable.description: [Exclusion]. [For females only] Could you be pregnant? Q6 [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA7
variable.description: [Exclusion]. Does participant pass all MRI exclusion criteria? Q7 [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA8A
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you ever had an injury that resulted in loss of consciousness (knocked out)? Q8a [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA9A
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you ever been in a coma? Q9a [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA9B
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you ever been in a coma? What was the cause? Q9b [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA10
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you ever been told you have cerebral palsy? Q10 [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA11
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you ever been told you have a brain tumor? Q11 [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA12A
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you ever had an operation on your brain? Q12a [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA12B
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you ever had an operation on your brain? What for? [BLOOD CLOT, BRAIN TUMOR, INJURY, SKULL FRACTURE, TUMOR REMOVAL, UNKNOWN]. Q12b [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA13A
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you ever had a seizure or convulsion? Q13a [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA13B
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you ever had a seizure or convulsion? Was this only as a child? Q13b [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA13C
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you ever had a seizure or convulsion? Did this occur within the last 5 years? Q13c [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA14
variable.description: [Interview]. Do you have loss of memory other than for people names? Q14 [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA15A
variable.description: [MRI appointment information]. Does participant agree to MRI? Q15a [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA15B
variable.description: [MRI appointment information]. Would you please tell me why you don't want the MRI examination? Q15b [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA15C
variable.description: [MRI appointment information]. Would you please tell me why you don't want the MRI examination? If other, specify. Q15c [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCAFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of MRI Screening Form [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCACY
variable.description: Contact year [7] [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MSCA8B
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you ever had an injury that resulted in loss of consciousness (knocked out)? How many times? Q8b [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [MRI Screening Form, exam 3]
